```51:88:src/registry.ts
for (let index = 0; index < allRoutePath.length; index++) {
    const router = allRoutePath[index];
    // æ˜¯å¦å¤„äºæ’é™¤åå•
    if (excludeRoutes.includes(router)) {
        continue;
    }
    const listApp = app.basePath(`/${router}`);
    // è¿”å›æ¦œå•
    listApp.get("/", async (c) => {
        // æ˜¯å¦é‡‡ç”¨ç¼“å­˜
        const noCache = c.req.query("cache") === "false";
        // é™åˆ¶æ˜¾ç¤ºæ¡ç›®
        const limit = c.req.query("limit");
        // æ˜¯å¦è¾“å‡º RSS
        const rssEnabled = c.req.query("rss") === "true";
        // è·å–è·¯ç”±è·¯å¾„
        const { handleRoute } = await import(`./routes/${router}.js`);
        const listData = await handleRoute(c, noCache);
        // æ˜¯å¦é™åˆ¶æ¡ç›®
        if (limit && listData?.data?.length > parseInt(limit)) {
            listData.total = parseInt(limit);
            listData.data = listData.data.slice(0, parseInt(limit));
        }
        // æ˜¯å¦è¾“å‡º RSS
        if (rssEnabled || config.RSS_MODE) {
            const rss = getRSS(listData);
            if (typeof rss === "string") {
                c.header("Content-Type", "application/xml; charset=utf-8");
                return c.body(rss);
            } else {
                return c.json({ code: 500, message: "RSS generation failed" }, 500);
            }
        }
        return c.json({ code: 200, ...listData });
    });
    // è¯·æ±‚æ–¹å¼é”™è¯¯
    listApp.all("*", (c) => c.json({ code: 405, message: "Method Not Allowed" }, 405));
}
```

```diff
+ 
+                     @media (max-width: 768px) {
+                         .platforms-container {
+                             flex-direction: column;
+                             align-items: center;
+                         }
+ 
+                         .platform-card {
+                             width: 100%;
+                             max-width: 400px;
+                         }
+ 
+                         .title {
+                             font-size: 2rem;
+                         }
+ 
+                         .floating-actions {
+                             bottom: 20px;
+                             right: 20px;
+                             flex-direction: row;
+                         }
+                     }
+ 
+                     .fade-in {
+                         animation: fadeIn 0.6s ease-out;
+                     }
+ 
+                     @keyframes fadeIn {
+                         from {
+                             opacity: 0;
+                             transform: translateY(30px);
+                         }
+                         to {
+                             opacity: 1;
+                             transform: translateY(0);
+                         }
+                     }
+ 
+                     .rotate-animation {
+                         animation: rotate 20s linear infinite;
+                     }
+ 
+                     @keyframes rotate {
+                         from { transform: rotateY(0deg); }
+                         to { transform: rotateY(360deg); }
+                     }
+                 </style>
+ 
+                 <script>
+                     let platformsData = [];
+                     let autoRotateInterval = null;
+                     let isAutoRotating = false;
+ 
+                     // è·å–æ‰€æœ‰å¹³å°åˆ—è¡¨
+                     async function getAllPlatforms() {
+                         try {
+                             const response = await fetch('/all');
+                             const data = await response.json();
+                             return data.routes || [];
+                         } catch (error) {
+                             console.error('è·å–å¹³å°åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥:', error);
+                             return [];
+                         }
+                     }
+ 
+                     // è·å–å•ä¸ªå¹³å°æ•°æ®
+                     async function getPlatformData(platformName) {
+                         try {
+                             const response = await fetch(\`/\${platformName}?limit=5\`);
+                             const data = await response.json();
+                             return data;
+                         } catch (error) {
+                             console.error(\`è·å– \${platformName} æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥:\`, error);
+                             return null;
+                         }
+                     }
+ 
+                     // åŠ è½½æ‰€æœ‰å¹³å°æ•°æ®
+                     async function loadAllPlatforms() {
+                         const loading = document.getElementById('loading');
+                         const container = document.getElementById('platformsContainer');
+                         
+                         try {
+                             const platforms = await getAllPlatforms();
+                             platformsData = [];
+                             
+                             // å¹¶è¡ŒåŠ è½½æ‰€æœ‰å¹³å°æ•°æ®
+                             const promises = platforms.map(platform => getPlatformData(platform.name));
+                             const results = await Promise.all(promises);
+                             
+                             results.forEach((data, index) => {
+                                 if (data && data.code === 200) {
+                                     platformsData.push(data);
+                                 }
+                             });
+ 
+                             // æ¸²æŸ“å¹³å°å¡ç‰‡
+                             renderPlatforms();
+                             
+                             loading.style.display = 'none';
+                             container.classList.add('fade-in');
+                             
+                         } catch (error) {
+                             console.error('åŠ è½½æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥:', error);
+                             loading.innerHTML = '<p style="color: #ff6b6b;">åŠ è½½å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·åˆ·æ–°é¡µé¢é‡è¯•</p>';
+                         }
+                     }
+ 
+                     // æ¸²æŸ“å¹³å°å¡ç‰‡
+                     function renderPlatforms() {
+                         const container = document.getElementById('platformsContainer');
+                         container.innerHTML = '';
+ 
+                         platformsData.forEach((platform, index) => {
+                             const card = document.createElement('div');
+                             card.className = 'platform-card';
+                             card.style.animationDelay = \`\${index * 0.1}s\`;
+ 
+                             const hotItems = platform.data.slice(0, 5).map((item, rank) => `
+                                 <div class="hot-item" onclick="openLink('\${item.url}')">
+                                     <div class="item-rank">\${rank + 1}</div>
+                                     <div class="item-content">
+                                         <div class="item-title">\${item.title}</div>
+                                         <div class="item-meta">
+                                             \${item.hot ? \`<span class="item-hot">\${formatHot(item.hot)}</span>\` : ''}
+                                             \${item.author ? \`<span class="item-author">\${item.author}</span>\` : ''}
+                                         </div>
+                                     </div>
+                                 </div>
+                             `).join('');
+ 
+                             card.innerHTML = \`
+                                 <div class="platform-header">
+                                     <div class="platform-name">\${platform.title}</div>
+                                     <div class="platform-type">\${platform.type}</div>
+                                 </div>
+                                 \${platform.description ? \`<div class="platform-description">\${platform.description}</div>\` : ''}
+                                 <div class="hot-items">
+                                     \${hotItems}
+                                 </div>
+                             \`;
+ 
+                             container.appendChild(card);
+                         });
+                     }
+ 
+                     // æ ¼å¼åŒ–çƒ­åº¦å€¼
+                     function formatHot(hot) {
+                         if (hot >= 10000) {
+                             return (hot / 10000).toFixed(1) + 'w';
+                         } else if (hot >= 1000) {
+                             return (hot / 1000).toFixed(1) + 'k';
+                         }
+                         return hot.toString();
+                     }
+ 
+                     // æ‰“å¼€é“¾æ¥
+                     function openLink(url) {
+                         window.open(url, '_blank');
+                     }
+ 
+                     // åˆ·æ–°æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®
+                     async function refreshAllData() {
+                         const loading = document.getElementById('loading');
+                         const container = document.getElementById('platformsContainer');
+                         
+                         loading.style.display = 'flex';
+                         container.style.display = 'none';
+                         
+                         await loadAllPlatforms();
+                         
+                         container.style.display = 'flex';
+                     }
+ 
+                     // åˆ‡æ¢è‡ªåŠ¨æ—‹è½¬
+                     function toggleAutoRotate() {
+                         const btn = document.getElementById('autoRotateBtn');
+                         const container = document.getElementById('platformsContainer');
+                         
+                         if (isAutoRotating) {
+                             clearInterval(autoRotateInterval);
+                             container.classList.remove('rotate-animation');
+                             btn.classList.remove('active');
+                             isAutoRotating = false;
+                         } else {
+                             container.classList.add('rotate-animation');
+                             btn.classList.add('active');
+                             isAutoRotating = true;
+                         }
+                     }
+ 
+                     // é‡ç½®è§†å›¾
+                     function resetView() {
+                         const container = document.getElementById('platformsContainer');
+                         container.classList.remove('rotate-animation');
+                         container.style.transform = '';
+                         
+                         if (isAutoRotating) {
+                             clearInterval(autoRotateInterval);
+                             document.getElementById('autoRotateBtn').classList.remove('active');
+                             isAutoRotating = false;
+                         }
+                     }
+ 
+                     // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæˆåå¼€å§‹åŠ è½½æ•°æ®
+                     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', loadAllPlatforms);
+                 </script>
+             `}
+         </Layout>
+     );
+ };
+ 
+ export default HotList;
```

</details>

```diff
+                         cursor: pointer;
+                         transition: all 0.3s ease;
+                     }
+ 
+                     .nav-dot.active {
+                         background: white;
+                         transform: scale(1.2);
+                     }
+ 
+                     .fade-in {
+                         animation: fadeIn 0.8s ease-out;
+                     }
+ 
+                     @keyframes fadeIn {
+                         from {
+                             opacity: 0;
+                             transform: translateY(50px);
+                         }
+                         to {
+                             opacity: 1;
+                             transform: translateY(0);
+                         }
+                     }
+ 
+                     .auto-rotate {
+                         animation: rotate 30s linear infinite;
+                     }
+ 
+                     @keyframes rotate {
+                         from { transform: rotateY(0deg); }
+                         to { transform: rotateY(360deg); }
+                     }
+ 
+                     @media (max-width: 768px) {
+                         .title {
+                             font-size: 2.5rem;
+                         }
+                         
+                         .platform-card {
+                             width: 350px;
+                             height: 500px;
+                         }
+                         
+                         .controls {
+                             flex-direction: column;
+                             align-items: center;
+                         }
+                         
+                         .control-btn {
+                             width: 200px;
+                             justify-content: center;
+                         }
+                     }
+                 </style>
+ 
+                 <script>
+                     let platformsData = [];
+                     let currentIndex = 0;
+                     let isAutoRotating = false;
+                     let autoRotateInterval = null;
+                     let rotationSpeed = 0;
+ 
+                     // è·å–æ‰€æœ‰å¹³å°åˆ—è¡¨
+                     async function getAllPlatforms() {
+                         try {
+                             const response = await fetch('/all');
+                             const data = await response.json();
+                             return data.routes || [];
+                         } catch (error) {
+                             console.error('è·å–å¹³å°åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥:', error);
+                             return [];
+                         }
+                     }
+ 
+                     // è·å–å•ä¸ªå¹³å°æ•°æ®
+                     async function getPlatformData(platformName) {
+                         try {
+                             const response = await fetch(\`/\${platformName}?limit=6\`);
+                             const data = await response.json();
+                             return data;
+                         } catch (error) {
+                             console.error(\`è·å– \${platformName} æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥:\`, error);
+                             return null;
+                         }
+                     }
+ 
+                     // åŠ è½½æ‰€æœ‰å¹³å°æ•°æ®
+                     async function loadAllPlatforms() {
+                         const loading = document.getElementById('loading');
+                         const carousel = document.getElementById('carousel');
+                         
+                         try {
+                             const platforms = await getAllPlatforms();
+                             platformsData = [];
+                             
+                             // å¹¶è¡ŒåŠ è½½æ‰€æœ‰å¹³å°æ•°æ®
+                             const promises = platforms.slice(0, 12).map(platform => getPlatformData(platform.name));
+                             const results = await Promise.all(promises);
+                             
+                             results.forEach((data, index) => {
+                                 if (data && data.code === 200) {
+                                     platformsData.push(data);
+                                 }
+                             });
+ 
+                             if (platformsData.length === 0) {
+                                 throw new Error('æ²¡æœ‰æˆåŠŸåŠ è½½ä»»ä½•å¹³å°æ•°æ®');
+                             }
+ 
+                             // æ¸²æŸ“å¹³å°å¡ç‰‡
+                             renderPlatforms();
+                             
+                             loading.style.display = 'none';
+                             carousel.classList.add('fade-in');
+                             
+                         } catch (error) {
+                             console.error('åŠ è½½æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥:', error);
+                             loading.innerHTML = '<p style="color: #ff6b6b;">åŠ è½½å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·åˆ·æ–°é¡µé¢é‡è¯•</p>';
+                         }
+                     }
+ 
+                     // æ¸²æŸ“å¹³å°å¡ç‰‡
+                     function renderPlatforms() {
+                         const carousel = document.getElementById('carousel');
+                         const navDots = document.getElementById('navDots');
+                         
+                         carousel.innerHTML = '';
+                         navDots.innerHTML = '';
+ 
+                         platformsData.forEach((platform, index) => {
+                             // åˆ›å»ºå¹³å°å¡ç‰‡
+                             const card = document.createElement('div');
+                             card.className = 'platform-card';
+                             card.style.transform = \`rotateY(\${index * (360 / platformsData.length)}deg) translateZ(400px)\`;
+ 
+                             const hotItems = platform.data.slice(0, 6).map((item, rank) => `
+                                 <div class="hot-item" onclick="openLink('\${item.url}')">
+                                     <div class="item-rank">\${rank + 1}</div>
+                                     <div class="item-content">
+                                         <div class="item-title">\${item.title}</div>
+                                         <div class="item-meta">
+                                             \${item.hot ? \`<span class="item-hot">\${formatHot(item.hot)}</span>\` : ''}
+                                             \${item.author ? \`<span class="item-author">\${item.author}</span>\` : ''}
+                                         </div>
+                                     </div>
+                                 </div>
+                             `).join('');
+ 
+                             card.innerHTML = \`
+                                 <div class="platform-header">
+                                     <div class="platform-name">
+                                         <div class="platform-icon">\${platform.title.charAt(0)}</div>
+                                         \${platform.title}
+                                     </div>
+                                     <div class="platform-type">\${platform.type}</div>
+                                 </div>
+                                 \${platform.description ? \`<div class="platform-description">\${platform.description}</div>\` : ''}
+                                 <div class="hot-items">
+                                     \${hotItems}
+                                 </div>
+                             \`;
+ 
+                             carousel.appendChild(card);
+ 
+                             // åˆ›å»ºå¯¼èˆªç‚¹
+                             const dot = document.createElement('div');
+                             dot.className = 'nav-dot';
+                             if (index === 0) dot.classList.add('active');
+                             dot.onclick = () => goToSlide(index);
+                             navDots.appendChild(dot);
+                         });
+                     }
+ 
+                     // æ ¼å¼åŒ–çƒ­åº¦å€¼
+                     function formatHot(hot) {
+                         if (hot >= 10000) {
+                             return (hot / 10000).toFixed(1) + 'w';
+                         } else if (hot >= 1000) {
+                             return (hot / 1000).toFixed(1) + 'k';
+                         }
+                         return hot.toString();
+                     }
+ 
+                     // æ‰“å¼€é“¾æ¥
+                     function openLink(url) {
+                         window.open(url, '_blank');
+                     }
+ 
+                     // è½¬åˆ°æŒ‡å®šå¹»ç¯ç‰‡
+                     function goToSlide(index) {
+                         if (platformsData.length === 0) return;
+                         
+                         currentIndex = index;
+                         const carousel = document.getElementById('carousel');
+                         const dots = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-dot');
+                         
+                         const angle = (360 / platformsData.length) * index;
+                         carousel.style.transform = \`rotateY(-\${angle}deg)\`;
+                         
+                         dots.forEach((dot, i) => {
+                             dot.classList.toggle('active', i === index);
+                         });
+                     }
+ 
+                     // ä¸‹ä¸€å¼ 
+                     function nextSlide() {
+                         currentIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % platformsData.length;
+                         goToSlide(currentIndex);
+                     }
+ 
+                     // ä¸Šä¸€å¼ 
+                     function prevSlide() {
+                         currentIndex = (currentIndex - 1 + platformsData.length) % platformsData.length;
+                         goToSlide(currentIndex);
+                     }
+ 
+                     // åˆ‡æ¢è‡ªåŠ¨æ—‹è½¬
+                     function toggleAutoRotate() {
+                         const btn = document.getElementById('autoRotateBtn');
+                         const carousel = document.getElementById('carousel');
+                         
+                         if (isAutoRotating) {
+                             clearInterval(autoRotateInterval);
+                             carousel.classList.remove('auto-rotate');
+                             btn.classList.remove('active');
+                             isAutoRotating = false;
+                         } else {
+                             carousel.classList.add('auto-rotate');
+                             btn.classList.add('active');
+                             isAutoRotating = true;
+                         }
+                     }
+ 
+                     // åˆ·æ–°æ•°æ®
+                     async function refreshData() {
+                         const loading = document.getElementById('loading');
+                         const carousel = document.getElementById('carousel');
+                         
+                         loading.style.display = 'flex';
+                         carousel.style.display = 'none';
+                         
+                         await loadAllPlatforms();
+                         
+                         carousel.style.display = 'block';
+                     }
+ 
+                     // é‡ç½®è§†å›¾
+                     function resetView() {
+                         const carousel = document.getElementById('carousel');
+                         carousel.classList.remove('auto-rotate');
+                         carousel.style.transform = '';
+                         
+                         if (isAutoRotating) {
+                             clearInterval(autoRotateInterval);
+                             document.getElementById('autoRotateBtn').classList.remove('active');
+                             isAutoRotating = false;
+                         }
+                         
+                         goToSlide(0);
+                     }
+ 
+                     // äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬
+                     document.getElementById('refreshBtn').onclick = refreshData;
+                     document.getElementById('autoRotateBtn').onclick = toggleAutoRotate;
+                     document.getElementById('resetBtn').onclick = resetView;
+                     document.getElementById('nextBtn').onclick = nextSlide;
+                     document.getElementById('prevBtn').onclick = prevSlide;
+ 
+                     // é”®ç›˜æ§åˆ¶
+                     document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
+                         switch(e.key) {
+                             case 'ArrowLeft':
+                                 prevSlide();
+                                 break;
+                             case 'ArrowRight':
+                                 nextSlide();
+                                 break;
+                             case ' ':
+                                 e.preventDefault();
+                                 toggleAutoRotate();
+                                 break;
+                         }
+                     });
+ 
+                     // é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®Œæˆåå¼€å§‹åŠ è½½æ•°æ®
+                     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', loadAllPlatforms);
+                 </script>
+             `}
+         </Layout>
+     );
+ };
+ 
+ export default AdvancedHotList;
```

```diff
+                     // æ›´æ–°ç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯
+                     function updateStats() {
+                         document.getElementById('loadedCount').textContent = loadedCount;

+                     // æ·»åŠ å¹³å°å¡ç‰‡åˆ°é¡µé¢
+                     function addPlatformCard(platform) {
+                         const container = document.getElementById('platformsContainer');
+                         const card = document.createElement('div');
+                         card.className = 'platform-card';
+                         card.style.animationDelay = \`\${loadedCount * 0.1}s\`;
+ 
+                         const hotItems = platform.data.slice(0, 5).map((item, rank) => {
+                             return \`
+                                 <div class="hot-item" onclick="openLink('\${item.url}')">
+                                     <div class="item-rank">\${rank + 1}</div>
+                                     <div class="item-content">
+                                         <div class="item-title">\${item.title}</div>
+                                         <div class="item-meta">
+                                             \${item.hot ? \`<span class="item-hot">\${formatHot(item.hot)}</span>\` : ''}
+                                             \${item.author ? \`<span class="item-author">\${item.author}</span>\` : ''}
+                                         </div>
+                                     </div>
+                                 </div>
+                             \`;
+                         }).join('');
+ 
+                         card.innerHTML = \`
+                             <div class="platform-header">
+                                 <div class="platform-name">
+                                     <div class="platform-icon">\${platform.title.charAt(0)}</div>
+                                     \${platform.title}
+                                 </div>
+                                 <div class="platform-type">\${platform.type}</div>
+                             </div>
+                             \${platform.description ? \`<div class="platform-description">\${platform.description}</div>\` : ''}
+                             <div class="hot-items">
+                                 \${hotItems}
+                             </div>
+                         \`;
+ 
+                         container.appendChild(card);
+                         loadedCount++;
+                         updateStats();
+                     }

+                     // åŠ è½½æ‰€æœ‰å¹³å°æ•°æ®ï¼ˆå¼‚æ­¥åŠ è½½ï¼‰
+                     async function loadAllPlatforms() {
+                         if (isLoading) return;
+                         isLoading = true;
+                         
+                         const loading = document.getElementById('loading');
+                         const container = document.getElementById('platformsContainer');
+                         
+                         try {
+                             const platforms = await getAllPlatforms();
+                             if (platforms.length === 0) {
+                                 throw new Error('æ— æ³•è·å–å¹³å°åˆ—è¡¨');
+                             }
+                             
+                             totalCount = platforms.length;
+                             loadedCount = 0;
+                             platformsData = [];
+                             container.innerHTML = '';
+                             updateStats();
+                             
+                             // éšè—åŠ è½½åŠ¨ç”»ï¼Œå¼€å§‹å¼‚æ­¥åŠ è½½
+                             loading.style.display = 'none';
+                             
+                             // åˆ†æ‰¹å¼‚æ­¥åŠ è½½ï¼Œæ¯æ‰¹3ä¸ªï¼Œé—´éš”2ç§’
+                             const batchSize = 3;
+                             const delay = 2000; // 2ç§’é—´éš”
+                             
+                             for (let i = 0; i < platforms.length; i += batchSize) {
+                                 const batch = platforms.slice(i, i + batchSize);
+                                 
+                                 // å¹¶è¡ŒåŠ è½½å½“å‰æ‰¹æ¬¡
+                                 const batchPromises = batch.map(async (platform) => {
+                                     const data = await getPlatformData(platform.name);
+                                     if (data && data.code === 200 && data.data && data.data.length > 0) {
+                                         platformsData.push(data);
+                                         addPlatformCard(data);
+                                     }
+                                 });
+                                 
+                                 await Promise.all(batchPromises);
+                                 
+                                 // å¦‚æœä¸æ˜¯æœ€åä¸€æ‰¹ï¼Œç­‰å¾…ä¸€æ®µæ—¶é—´å†ç»§ç»­
+                                 if (i + batchSize < platforms.length) {
+                                     await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, delay));
+                                 }
+                             }
+ 
+                             // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æœ‰æ•°æ®åŠ è½½æˆåŠŸ
+                             if (platformsData.length === 0) {
+                                 container.innerHTML = \`
+                                     <div class="error-message">
+                                         <h3>åŠ è½½å¤±è´¥</h3>
+                                         <p>æ‰€æœ‰å¹³å°æ•°æ®åŠ è½½å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘ç»œè¿æ¥æˆ–ç¨åé‡è¯•</p>
+                                         <button onclick="refreshAllData()" style="margin-top: 10px; padding: 8px 16px; background: #667eea; color: white; border: none; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer;">
+                                             é‡æ–°åŠ è½½
+                                         </button>
+                                     </div>
+                                 \`;
+                             } else if (platformsData.length < totalCount) {
+                                 // éƒ¨åˆ†æˆåŠŸï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºåŠ è½½æ›´å¤šæç¤º
+                                 const loadingMore = document.createElement('div');
+                                 loadingMore.className = 'loading-more';
+                                 loadingMore.innerHTML = \`å·²åŠ è½½ \${platformsData.length} ä¸ªå¹³å°ï¼Œéƒ¨åˆ†å¹³å°åŠ è½½å¤±è´¥\`;
+                                 container.appendChild(loadingMore);
+                             }
+                             
+                         } catch (error) {
+                             console.error('åŠ è½½æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥:', error);
+                             loading.style.display = 'none';
+                             container.innerHTML = \`
+                                 <div class="error-message">
+                                     <h3>åŠ è½½å¤±è´¥</h3>
+                                     <p>æ— æ³•è·å–çƒ­æ¦œæ•°æ®ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘ç»œè¿æ¥æˆ–ç¨åé‡è¯•</p>
+                                     <button onclick="refreshAllData()" style="margin-top: 10px; padding: 8px 16px; background: #667eea; color: white; border: none; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer;">
+                                         é‡æ–°åŠ è½½
+                                     </button>
+                                 </div>
+                             \`;
+                         } finally {
+                             isLoading = false;
+                         }
+                     }
+ 
+                     // æ ¼å¼åŒ–çƒ­åº¦å€¼
+                     function formatHot(hot) {
+                         if (hot >= 10000) {
+                             return (hot / 10000).toFixed(1) + 'w';
+                         } else if (hot >= 1000) {
+                             return (hot / 1000).toFixed(1) + 'k';
+                         }
+                         return hot.toString();
+                     }
+ 
+                     // æ‰“å¼€é“¾æ¥
+                     function openLink(url) {
+                         window.open(url, '_blank');
+                     }
+ 
+                     // åˆ·æ–°æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®
+                     async function refreshAllData() {
+                         if (isLoading) return;
+                         
+                         const loading = document.getElementById('loading');
+                         const container = document.getElementById('platformsContainer');
+                         
+                         loading.style.display = 'flex';
+                         container.style.display = 'none';
+                         
+                         await loadAllPlatforms();
+                         
+                         container.style.display = 'grid';
+                     }
+ 
+                     // åˆ‡æ¢è‡ªåŠ¨æ—‹è½¬
+                     function toggleAutoRotate() {
+                         const btn = document.getElementById('autoRotateBtn');
+                         const container = document.getElementById('platformsContainer');
+                         
+                         if (isAutoRotating) {
+                             clearInterval(autoRotateInterval);
+                             container.classList.remove('rotate-animation');
+                             btn.classList.remove('active');
+                             isAutoRotating = false;
+                         } else {
+                             container.classList.add('rotate-animation');
+                             btn.classList.add('active');
+                             isAutoRotating = true;
+                         }
+                     }
+ 
+                     // é‡ç½®è§†å›¾
+                     function resetView() {
+                         const container = document.getElementById('platformsContainer');
+                         container.classList.remove('rotate-animation');
+                         container.style.transform = '';
+                         
+                         if (isAutoRotating) {
+                             clearInterval(autoRotateInterval);
+                             document.getElementById('autoRotateBtn').classList.remove('active');
+                             isAutoRotating = false;
+                         }
+                     }
+

+                     document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', loadAllPlatforms);
```
